How many people are affected by PRICKLE1-related progressive myoclonus epilepsy with ataxia ?,The prevalence of PRICKLE1-related progressive myoclonus epilepsy with ataxia is unknown. The condition has been reported in three large families from Jordan and northern Israel and in at least two unrelated individuals.,GHR,PRICKLE1-related progressive myoclonus epilepsy wi
